alert.note: Alert for Clearwater; Pennington; Polk; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 3:21PM CDT until May 29 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Red Lake County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Pennington County in northwestern Minnesota... West central Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 321 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brooks, or 24 miles south of Thief River Falls, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Erskine, Oklee, Brooks, Gully, Trail, Roland and Mentor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
